sentence.value: Leslie flew as a payload specialist on STS-73 launched on October 20, 1995 and landed at the Kennedy Space Center on November 5, 1995.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Leslie flew as a payload specialist on [[STS-73|STS-73]] launched on October 20, 1995 and landed at [[the Kennedy Space Center|Kennedy_Space_Center]] on November 5, 1995.

sentence.value: The 16 day mission aboard Space Shuttle Columbia focused on materials science, biotechnology, combustion science, and fluid physics contained within the pressurized Spacelab module.
sentence.annotated-sentence: The 16 day mission aboard [[Space Shuttle Columbia|Space_Shuttle_Columbia]] focused on [[materials|Material]] [[science|Science]], [[biotechnology|Biotechnology]], [[combustion|Combustion]] [[science|Science]], and [[fluid physics|Fluid_mechanics]] contained within the pressurized [[Spacelab|Spacelab]] module.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The 16 day mission aboard Space Shuttle Columbia focused on materials science, biotechnology, combustion science, and fluid physics contained within the pressurized Spacelab module.
